name: EPAM
description: I am in charge of migrating applications made in Angular v13 to v18. Refactoring to improve performance, reusability, and good practices on private libraries and applications. Coding review. Adding unit, integration, and e2e testing, with Jest, Testing library for Angular, also Storybooks with play functions. Azure CICD, Jira. Implementing signals.
highlights: Migrated Angular applications from v13 to v18
Testing with Jest, Testing Library and Storybook
